title: Better error reporting on running out of memory with GMTK vs other problems

content.raw:
Currently segway does not distinguish issues between GMTK potentially running out memory to correctly run vs other software issues (such as improper environment settings). Segway assumes that failed jobs are a result of GMTK running out of memory then are attempted again with increased memory. This is not ideal in the problem isn't with GMTK and there's actually sufficient memory available.

Ideally segway would be able to identify/report the error that occured and early-exit out of running jobs if the error is not a GMTK and memory issue. If there's something wrong with the environment settings it should identify the issue immediately, report it, and exit.
